name: King Content
overview:
Content is at the heart of everything we do. King Content is Australiaâ€™s leading digital content marketing and creation agency. We specialise in producing quality editorial for Websites, Blogs, Newsletters and Social Media properties. Whatever the platform, King Content understands what is required to deliver a conversation, a conversion and a result. The team behind King Content have been delivering content to Australian brands and websites for over 20 years. With search engines casting such a large shadow over online consumption, digital content not only needs to engage consumers, but also deliver optimum SEO performance. We believe that all forms of digital content must work with the needs of these two masters.

In contrast to traditional marketing strategies that aim to increase sales or awareness through interruption techniques, content marketing subscribes to the notion that delivering high-quality, relevant and valuable information to prospects and customers at the right moment, will drive profitable consumer actions.

Content marketing has mutual benefits in relation to consumer retention and increased brand loyalty, delivering far greater efficiency than traditional marketing techniques.
